Package org.jesktop.frimble

Interface Summary
Frimble Frimble is just a helper class.
FrimbleAware Interface FrimbleAware allows apps to have menus and titles (plus more) without being tied to JFrame etc.

FrimbleFactory Interface FrimbleFactory
FrimbleListener Interface FrimbleListener
